title: Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald says The Masked Singer 'made his life HELL'
text:
No one was more relieved to see The Prawn unmasked on Monday's episode of The Masked Singer than Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald.

For weeks, rumours had swirled that the 42-year-old Nova FM radio host was the mystery crustacean.

And after Darren McMullen was revealed as the celebrity behind the costume, Fitzy told listeners on Tuesday that a weight had been lifted off his shoulders.

Scroll down for video

It's over! Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald (left) has revealed The Masked Singer 'made his life HELL' due to persistent rumours he was The Prawn - as Darren McMullen (centre) is revealed as the man behind the costume. Pictured with Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli (right)

'I'm so glad [you have] been revealed. It has made my life so much easier,' he said on Fitzy & Wippa during an interview with Darren.

'It made my life hell, because I had so many people thinking I was The Prawn.'

Even Fitzy's co-host, Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli, thought he could have been The Prawn, after several of the clues pointed at him.

Mistaken identity! 'I'm so glad The Prawn has been revealed. It has made my life so much easier,' Fitzy said on Nova FM during an interview with Darren on Tuesday

It's Darren! Shortly after The Prawn's debut on The Masked Singer, fans were convinced Fitzy was the man behind the mask based on the clues

Shortly after The Prawn's debut on The Masked Singer, fans were convinced Fitzy was the man behind the mask based on the clues.

In addition to being tall (Fitzy is 6ft 5in), The Prawn was said to have an interest in sport as well as a love of music, which aligns with the fact Fitzy is a former AFL player who now works in commercial radio.

'It seems like the Prawn is meant to be foreign, but still seems to have an Aussie accent, so I'm still going with Fitzy,' on person tweeted earlier in the season.

Evidence? In addition to being tall (Fitzy is 6ft 5in), The Prawn was said to have an interest in sport as well as a love of music, which aligns with the fact Fitzy is a former AFL player who now works in commercial radio. Pictured: Fans speculating about The Prawn's identity on Twitter

'Fitzy could very much be the prawn. But can he sing like that?' asked another.

A third viewer tweeted: '[My] sister says prawn is Fitzy. Best guest I've heard so far.'

The Masked Singer Australia continues Tuesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10
description: No one was more relieved to see The Prawn unmasked on Monday's episode of The Masked Singer than Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
